languages.text: "Агентура докладывает, что недовольные активно ведут общение с обитателями пустошей, остатками так называемого клана бригадиров. И те даже готовы оказать им поддержку".

"Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."
languages.original_text: "Агентура докладывает, что недовольные активно ведут общение с обитателями пустошей, остатками так называемого клана бригадиров. И те даже готовы оказать им поддержку".

traits.locale_text: "The agents report that the disgruntled people are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called brigadier clan. And they are seemingly willing to support them."
"The agents report that the disgruntled people are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called brigadier clan. And they are seemingly willing to support them."

"Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

"Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems they are willing to offer their support."

"Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

languages.text: “您的特工报告说，一部分心怀不满的人正在积极与废土居民谈判。那些废土居民正是领班氏族的残党，而且他们似乎愿意提供支持。”
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: “您的特工报告说，一部分心怀不满的人正在积极与废土居民谈判。那些废土居民正是领班氏族的残党，而且他们似乎愿意提供支持。”
“您的特工报告说，一部分心怀不满的人正在积极与废土居民谈判。那些居民正是领班氏族的残党，而且他们似乎愿意提供支持。”

languages.text: «Los agentes informan de que los inconformistas están negociando activamente con los habitantes del páramo, los restos del llamado clan de los capataces. Y parece que el clan está dispuesto a ofrecer su apoyo».
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: «Los agentes informan de que los inconformistas están negociando activamente con los habitantes del páramo, los restos del llamado clan de los capataces. Y parece que el clan está dispuesto a ofrecer su apoyo».

languages.text: 「諜報員の報告によると、不満を抱いた者達は、ウエストランドの住人...いわゆる准将一族の残党とは積極的に交渉しているようだ。しかも、ウエストランドの住人は力を惜しまず支援しようとしている」
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: 「諜報員の報告によると、不満を抱いた者達は、ウエストランドの住人...いわゆる准将一族の残党とは積極的に交渉しているようだ。しかも、力を惜しまず支援しようとしている」
「諜報員の報告によると、不満を抱いた者達は、ウエストランドの住人...いわゆる准将一族の残党とは積極的に交渉しているようだ。しかも、力を惜しまず支援しようとしている」

languages.text: « Des agents signalent que les mécontents négocient activement avec les habitants des terres désolées... enfin, avec ce qui reste du clan des chefs d'équipe. Il semble qu'ils soient prêts à leur prêter main-forte. »
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: « Des agents signalent que les mécontents négocient activement avec les habitants des terres désolées... enfin, avec ce qui reste du clan des chefs d'équipe. Il semble qu'ils soient prêts à leur prêter main-forte. »

languages.text: "Agenten berichten, dass die unzufriedenen Bürger aktiv mit den Bewohnern des Ödlands verhandeln, den Überresten des Vorarbeiter-Clans. Und offenbar sind die Ödländer bereit, ihre Unterstützung anzubieten."
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: "Agenten berichten, dass die unzufriedenen Bürger aktiv mit den Bewohnern des Ödlands verhandeln, den Überresten des Vorarbeiter-Clans. Und offenbar sind die Ödländer bereit, ihre Unterstützung anzubieten."

"Agenten berichten, dass die unzufriedenen Bürger aktiv mit den Bewohnern des Ödlands verhandeln, den Überresten des so genannten Brigadierclans. Und offenbar sind sie bereit, ihre Unterstützung anzubieten."

languages.text: "Ajanlar, hoşnutsuz yurttaşların sözüm ona ustabaşı klanından geriye kalanların oluşturduğu çorak toprak halkları ile aktif olarak müzakere hâlinde olduklarını raporluyorlar. Görünüşe göre çorak toprak halkları, desteklerini sunmaya hazır gibi görünüyorlarmış."
languages.original_text: "Agents report that the disgruntled are actively negotiating with the wasteland dwellers — the remains of the so-called foreman clan. And it seems the wastelanders are willing to offer their support."

traits.locale_text: "Ajanlar, hoşnutsuz yurttaşların sözüm ona ustabaşı klanından geriye kalanların oluşturduğu çorak toprak halkları ile aktif olarak müzakere hâlinde olduklarını raporluyorlar. Görünüşe göre çorak toprak halkları, desteklerini sunmaya hazır gibi görünüyorlarmış."
